name: T.R.E.N.C.H.
description:
“Tactical Drop! Death from above!”

“Recon! Find where they are!”

“Engage! Quick and deadly!”

“Neutralize! Leave no survivors!”

“Capture! Take what is theirs!”

“Home! Where we’ll head when this is done!”

-Trooper’s Creed, circa 2134

T.R.E.N.C.H is a gritty RTS/anti-tower defense game for the PC.

Your troops sit before you like sand on a beach, but the enemies’ defenses are strong. Use superior numbers and tactical prowess to pull victory from uncertain odds. The dead will be honored.
